name: SOLAR DECATHLON EUROPE
goal: Solar Decathlon Europe is an European Competition for unviersities that have to design and assemble high efficient zero energy houses powered by the sun, and have to pass ten different contests (Decathlon). The objective of the competition is to Foster innovation in energy efficiency and sustainability, and make professionals, students, and people aware about these topics. There have been three editions of SDE Competitions in Madrid 2010 and 2012, and in Paris in 2014.
interests: Climate Action, Development, Education, Energy, Environment, Research and Technology
euInitiatives:
.- 2002 – ENERGY EFFICIENCY IN BUILDINGS
.- 2009 – USE OF RENEWABLE ENERGY
.- 2010 – BUILDINGS NET-ZERO EMISSIONS
.- 2011 – NEW DIRECTIVE ENERGY EFFICIENCY
.- SET PLAN
.- H2020
